name: Sure Casting
components: V, F (a square of cloth and a needle)
text: You gain temporary insight into your enemies’ magical defenses. When you next cast a spell before the end of the next round, treat your caster level as 5 higher than normal for the purpose of overcoming spell resistance. This bonus doesn’t increase any other effects that depend on caster level, such as the spell’s damage or range, and affects only the first spell cast after sure casting.
components_zh: 语言、器材（一块方布和一根针）
text_zh: 你获得暂时的洞察力来看穿敌人的魔法防御。当你在下一轮结束前施放一个法术，在击穿法术抗性时视你的施法者等级比正常情况高5级。此加值不会增加任何其他由施法者等级影响的效果，如法术的伤害或范围，并只影响施放精确施法后的第一个法术。
